Package BE

Class CommitteeMember

java.lang.Object
BE.User
BE.Student
BE.CommitteeMember
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuDisplayable
public class CommitteeMember extends Student
Represents a Committee Member, extending the functionality of a Student. Committee members are individuals participating in specific contexts as part of a committee.
